Unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource.
NotFound: The requested resource was not found.
DbError: A database error occurred. Please try again later.
SqlFK: Cannot delete resource because it is referenced elsewhere.
SqlDeadlock: Request failed due to a database conflict. Please retry.
SqlNotNull: Missing required data: a field was left empty.
SqlFallback: A database error occurred. Please contact support.
Internal: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.
